headline: Leidos to Buy Kohlberg’s Entrust for $2.4 Billion
summary: Leidos Holdings has struck a deal to buy utility consulting and engineering services platform Entrust Solutions Group from private-equity firm Kohlberg & Co. for about $2.4 billion in cash.

raw.headline: Leidos to Buy Kohlberg’s Entrust for $2.4 Billion

headline: Leidos to buy power design firm ENTRUST for about $2.4 billion
summary: Jan 26 () - Defense contractor Leidos Holdings said ​on Monday it would ‌buy power design firm ENTRUST ‌Solutions Group from private equity firm Kohlberg for about $2.4 billion to bolster ⁠its engineering ‌offerings for utilities.

raw.headline: Leidos to buy power design firm ENTRUST for about $2.4 billion

headline: Kohlberg Announces Sale of ENTRUST Solutions Group to Leidos for $2.4 Billion
summary: MOUNT KISCO, N.Y., January 26, 2026--Kohlberg, a leading U.S. middle-market private equity firm, today announced that it has entered into a definitive agreement to sell ENTRUST Solutions Group ("ENTRUST" or the "Company") to Leidos (NYSE: LDOS) for approximately $2.4 billion. The transaction represents a successful exit for Kohlberg, following its initial acquisition of the Company in 2019 and a minority recapitalization in 2023.

headline: Leidos to acquire power design firm ENTRUST, bolstering its energy infrastructure portfolio
summary: Leidos (NYSE: LDOS) has signed a definitive agreement to acquire ENTRUST Solutions Group from Kohlberg for approximately $2.4 billion, accelerating Leidos' position as a leading engineering solutions provider for utilities nationwide.
